name: Jaime 0212
text:
Very disappointed in the service.  I purchased a NEW dishwasher December 21st.  Marquez was extremely helpful!  I can't rave about him enough.  My issue came when I was told my dishwasher was in stock in Bham but due to the holidays their 1 installer wouldn't be able to install until after all the holidays.  Okay, I understood the desire to take a break and be with family.  After January 4th I still never heard from anyone to schedule my install.  I finally called on January on January 8th to track down someone to help get this installed.  They were able to come install my dishwasher on the 13th.  The gentlemen that installed my NEW Bosch dishwasher made me aware that the 3rd row was shipped with broken clips so it wouldn't work but that's okay they would have someone come right back out to fix the issue.  After several days of no communication I once again called the store and was told oh yea Shane can come out on January 25th.  Great! Finally I will be able to use my new dishwasher properly.  Shane arrives on the 25th with a 3rd row for the dishwasher.  He was NOT informed properly of the problem and only had the drawer itself.  So once again Im left with a dishwasher that can not be utilized to the fullest.  Shane tells me he will go back to the shop and grab the clips off of another dishwasher and be back to fix the issue.  I wait and wait.  I finally get a hold of Mike on February 5th.  He informs me that the job has been listed as complete!!!  There was no order to get new clips there was nothing listed as needing to still be fixed.  Mike tells me that he will call me back before the end of day OR call me on Monday February 8th to tell me what can be done.  Again, I wait!  I called today the 12th a FULL MONTH after my dishwasher was installed.  Mike tells me oh those clips are on back order.  I asked for some type of date as to expect them he states could be end of February.
My issue is the POOR COMMUNICATION!!!!   1st. the installer NEVER reported the correct issue with my dishwasher had he done so properly Shane would never have come to my house with the wrong part.  2nd Shane completed the job.  This is a HUGE FAIL!!!  3rd. Mike never contacted me to let me know there is no part readily available and it will be back ordered.  When I reached out as I've had to do every since they took my money back in December Mike acted a little confused to why I would be calling.

I expect better when paying for a top of the line appliance.  I've gotten better service from a big box store!  I understand parts get broken in the box and no one is aware but this should've been taken care of in January! This was NOT a warranty issue as it was delivered to me broken!!! The product was not ever used.  I am NOT happy that I will have to wait until March to fully use my dishwasher the proper way.  The whole reason I came to All South was the earliest Bob Wallace could get the dishwasher installed was March 4th!!!  If I had known I would be stuck until March to begin with I would've gave Bob Wallace my money!

name: Jason Newell
text:
Allsouth was the appliance sub for our builder (who is outstanding, by the way).  All they had to do was install three appliances.  THREE.  The only thing these jag-offs got right was the delivery of the appliances and *sliding in* our new oven.  The dishwasher and microwave were both dropped.  This was obvious because (a) we saw the palette in our garage prior to installation, (b) one side of the palette was "injured", (c) the corresponding sides of the appliances from that side of the palette were both broken.

To add insult to injury, they didn't use the granite counter installation kit for the dishwasher.  This would help considering they don't want to fix the broken feet.  Now, when you open a loaded dishwasher, the whole machine rotates thereby "dishcharging" the bottom rack of dishes out onto your floor.  This is entertaining to guests.

The microwave is also fun.  The plate does not rotate properly so you can always tell when it's in use because of the "thump-thump" made by the turntable, much like a broken record but without the repetitive music.  Also, the clock is crooked so you can't tell if it's AM or PM (which actually matters during the winter when it's dark at 5AM and 5PM).  And the oven vent built into the microwave is broken so it slides right out after only unfastening two screws when it should be held together by four screws.  The other two take bits of the broken plastic housing with them.

Normally I wouldn't care because these appliances are "builder grade" but it's the principle of the matter.  Allsouth is not interested in fixing or replacing the appliances which can be done EXTREMELY EASILY when you're a flippin' vendor.  They're only interested in minimalist work, single trips, and offering to "send out an inspector" which was already been done by the builder who verified that the pieces are indeed broken.  We're guessing Allsouth doesn't trust the builder that hired them in the first place.  They also will not come out on your time, only their time, so if you work and are busy from 8am to 5pm, you can bet you'll never see nor hear from them again.

name: JoJo Campbell
text:
Always had a great experience from Allsouth Appliance until today.  I called a week ago and requested service on my refrigerator and they scheduled me for today, between 8 and 12.  I rearranged my schedule so that I could be home for the four hour period. I decided at 9:00, this morning, I should call and confirm.  I was told their service technician is out sick for a couple of weeks and they had transferred my appt to "Service Care" in Birmingham.  I asked for a number to contact them for a confirmation.  I called Service Care and spoke to a really nice many who was shocked that I was expecting them today because they had just gotten the information yesterday.   He said they are in Birmingham so they are trying to schedule all Huntsville appointments for the same day and MAYBE they would be able to get here next week.
I certainly understand when an employee is out sick that the the schedule has to be changed but I am disappointed in Allsouth that they did not contact me to let me know that my appt had been transferred to someone else AND that it would not occur today.  I took time off from work to be here and now will have to do it again for when they are able to come and make the repair.

text: I have used them for the past year and a half and have had consistently small issues with them. Maybe it’s just my attention to detail, but those details are important to me. Like making sure the screws on my filter assembly on my pump are screwed down all the way so it’s not sucking in air, cross threading the drain on my sand filter and when I tell people at the store about it it takes them two weeks to finally replace it and fix it, when they opened up my pool for the first time this year and started the pump they opened up a access panel on the electric motor side and left it open and didn’t tell me about it leaving it accessible to rain and debris. Two weeks ago I had to replace my pump, just a coincidence. I don’t think so. Between all the details that they don’t pay attention to and the absolute horrible communication between the front Store staff, the staff that clean the pools and the general manager. I could no longer put up with their horrible service. They might be knowledgeable, but all they did was cost me more money.

name: Alan Smith
text: Last December, we approached Anders Pool Company, to install a new liner in our in-ground swimming pool. In beginning, the staff were extremely polite, courteous , knowledgeable  and pleasant to interact with. We picked out the pattern we wanted, and paid 50% of the total cost, to cover the  price of manufacturing the liner which, was very reasonable indeed. Steve came out in late December, to take the measurements of the pool, to pass onto the liner manufacturer. We then agreed to call Anders Pool, early March, to set a date to install the liner. I called Anders Pool, March 9th, and spoke with Steve, and set the date to install the new liner on Wednesday, March 27th. Steve touched base with me, a few days before the install date, to make sure we were good to go. Chris and two other staff, arrived early Wednesday, and drained the pool with a gas pump. They removed the old liner, thoroughly, and I mean thoroughly, cleaned, the pool walls and floors, smoothed over the pool floor and installed the new liner without any issues at all. Then, they set up a vacuum pump and a set a vacuum hose between the pool wall and the pool liner, to suck the trapped air out as we filled the pool from the faucet. The Anders pool liner installers, were extremely Professional and polite throughout the entire operation. They did a fantastic job, far, far, better than their local competition, that I'd used for the two previous liners, over the past 30 years. This liner fits snuggly up against the 4 ft. radius walls of the pool. Anders Pool, took the time, to accurately measure the pools dimensions. The previous pool company, when measuring up, rounded down the measurements, to get an even number. Which, resulted in a poor fitting liner. If you need a new pool liner, make sure you get a quote from Anders Pool Company. Trust me, they'll get you the best price and, the best quality liner, and the best possible installation. This company is well worth my 5 star rating.

name: Amanda Guthrie
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly

name: Brian W. Kittrell
text:
I absolutely love these guys. They are always friendly and incredibly helpful and responsive.
There is a great selection from lamps & lanterns to charcoal grill accessories. They have always been able to help or at least guide me in the right direction for any gas-related issues. I highly recommend going here before looking online. Prices are more than reasonable.

name: Jerome Lockhart
text: Give you good information over the phone and in person treats you like family very good products and good warranty

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Lockhart! We so much appreciate you and enjoyed working with you and Mrs. Lockhart! Thank you for your business! We hope you enjoy your gas logs! Come back to see us!

name: J L
text: Have used AG&L for years - the product quality, customer service and professionalism are unmatched.  Products are high quality and not the cheapest, yet they hold up over the long-term.  Friendly staff and ownership.

name: Susan Johnson
text: I haven’t even visited this store yet but I already appreciate their honesty. I called to find someone to come light the pilot light to my gas logs; I waited until the day before the predicted big snow of 2019. I was advised to wait until it could be properly serviced since I had not used the gas logs in years. I was told that they always clean the gas logs and do a safety check before lighting the logs. I was very appreciative of their concern for my safety and agreed to wait to have my gas logs cleaned, inspected, and then lit.

name: Nick Roof
text: This place is fantastic and so are the people that work here. Very knowledgeable about all of there products and will help you with any questions. They also sell top of the line products! I will definitely use again in the future.

name: Jenn miller
text: Excellent service, knowledgeable and friendly. Highly recommend!!

name: Timothy Scott
text: Best, most knowledgeable service in North AL! I travelled from HSV and wasn't disappointed. Mike knows his products, options, and manufacturers. Delivery was prompt and efficient. Thanks, Mike!!

name: Evan Bates
text: Fantastic store. They specialize in all things gas - lights, gas logs, and grills.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The prices are reasonable and they take care of everything. The goods they sell are top quality and most are warrantied for life

name: Christina Webb
text: Great people and very nice. We love our new gas logs

name: David Patton
text: Alabama Gas Light and Grill has a knowledgeable staff and carries high quality grills and accessories.   I bought our MHP gas grill there a few years ago and it's been extremely durable.   Stainless steel burner has a lifetime warranty and I expect this grill to last a lifetime itself.    They also carry a variety of charcoal grills and smoking accessories including a good selection of wood chunks for smoke flavoring.    Support your local business and economy by buying from small businesses like this and get better products and support.

name: D Britt
text: Helpful and professional service..

name: Dave D.
text: The store is a little cramped, but there’s a ton of great products to find. Even sell wood chips for your grilling needs. Will be back.

name: Jenny Horton
text: In 2003 I bought a MHP grill from Mr. Barnett.  The grill is still going strong and the few parts Ive had to replace where covered by the life time warranty.  Mr Barnett and his staff have provided great service over the years and I will definitely plan to buy my next grill there.  The merchandise sold at the store (grills, outdoor furniture, gas logs and ceramic grills) are high end and made to last.Shop at Alabama Gaslight and Grill if you want quality along with great service.

name: James Clay
text: Staff very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: John Jackson
text: Great showroom! The employees at this store are friendly and very helpful.

name: Kevin Warren
text: They have the best selection of grills and a completely awesome staff. No better place to buy a grill and accessories in the state of Alabama.

name: Lee Winnige
text: If you're tired of replacing your Chinese made grill every year or two and are ready to upgrade to a serious piece of equipment come to this place.

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Friendly staff

name: Sean Richards
text: We really enjoyed working with Bryan and team. The worked on building an outdoor kitchen, flagstone path and rebuilding flagstone steps. They delivered on their commitments to high quality and ensuring we were happy with the project completion before asking for payment. They communicate upfront in an effective and frequent manner. They also improved on the ideas we had for the project and brought their knowledge and experience to help us make decisions that made sense. If you are considering them for a project you won’t find any better. I’m now looking for more opportunities to work with them!!

name: Steven Pearl
text: Bryan and his team were fantastic to work with! They were responsive, hard working, professional and paid incredible attention to detail on the entire project. The completely exceeded our expectations as far as what the space would look like. What started as a boring backyard turned into a resort looking space that we never want to leave! Can’t thank Bryan and his team enough for delivering such a perfect outdoor space for us to enjoy!

name: Amanda Champion
text: We had an awesome experience with The Backyard Auburn.  Bryan's crew did an amazing job on our flagstone sidewalk and sitting area.  They were prompt, professional and worked nonstop to get the job done.  Will definitely use them again for future projects.

name: Lauren Mackey
text: The Backyard just completed 2 flagstone patios, with a rock bench, and firepit in our backyard. It turned out better than we ever expected! They were exceptional with quality, communication, and worked quickly while paying close attention to detail. You can tell they take pride in what they do. We previously had a flagstone path done by another company and the end products don't even compare. The Backyard's patio is definitely a far superior finish. We really enjoyed working with our job's Forman Kensley and all of his crew they were fantastic to work with! If you need someone to update your outdoor space, then I highly recommend The Backyard in Auburn!

name: Cynthia Waldrep
text: Excellent all around with outstanding service, communication and overall experience!  Brian and his team were awesome and easy to work with.  I called one afternoon to inquire about an outdoor stone fireplace and he was at my lake house the very next morning.  After sharing his ideas and his vision with me, we ended up adding an outdoor kitchen as well and I could not be happier!!  The price he quoted was reasonable and the work was done as specified in a timely manner.  So happy I found Brian and The Backyard and I will definitely use them again!

name: Eric Cross
text: Outstanding quality and service! Nothing but praise for the entire company. Brian and Kendall made this such an easy process. Highly recommend!

name: Steve Toledo
text: Brian the owner is amazing to work with. His stone is high quality and the delivery was simple and easy. 5 star overall very professional and would definitely use again!

name: Diana Catrett
text: Great work, would highly recommend The Backyard.  They know what they are doing and the crew that did the work were great.  They finished the job in one day.  That arrived at 7 am and worked non stop except for a lunch break.  Kensley was very polite and reassuring that if I had any questions I thought of later, not to hesitate to call.  After the job was complete, I received a phone call from Bryan Waites asking if I had any questions and if I was happy with the work.  Can't say enough good things about this company!

name: Bob Parker
text:
Every person at The Backyard has been a pleasure in the way they conduct their business. Extremely professional and courteous with their customers interest and satisfaction as the focus of their business. We just finished an expansion of our porch to a patio with a new stone surface throughout and the finished product is perfect.  Bryan listened to our requests and offered some excellent input that helped us with our final decision.
They arrived on time and stayed until all the work was finished. The cleanup of our yard was excellent as well as the front street and sidewalk after all was finished. The yard, including grass and flower beds were as if nothing had been disturbed.
We could not be more pleased from start to finish. Polite and respectful crew members and excellent, quality workmanship means we will call Bryan again for more work as we continue our landscaping plans.

name: R Blanchard
text: Hired Brian and his team to put in a patio and firepit to match our house on the lake.  Brian was patient as we tried to figure out the best way to situate the firepit.  He just completed the work and we couldn't be happier with the way it turned out.  Top quality work at a reasonable price.  Most importantly he communicated and showed up when he said he would.  Something I'm not use to living on the lake. Thanks again Brian. Highly recommend!

name: Molly Wilson
text: Love the new patio The Backyard installed today!  Already asked if they can install another one!  Very hardworking crew. I highly recommend them!

name: Brian Weiss
text: Bryan and his team at The Backyard of Auburn are absolutely the best in the business. Great communication, high attention to detail, and with a finished product that will WOW you for years to come. They completed a beautiful stone retaining wall with large stone steps up to our pool three years ago, and just last week capped our pool deck with stunning flagstone - breathtaking! This decision absolutely transformed our pool, and we cannot wait for family and friends to enjoy it with us. Bryan truly cares about his customers and stands by his work. We have "one more" project and with no hesitation it will be Bryan and his team with The Backyard.

name: Brittney Thaxton
text: Our patio was finished yesterday and to say we are extremely pleased would be an understatement!!! Everything was completed on time and at the amount we were quoted. We will definitely reach out to get our front porch done later this year. Completely blown away with how much this has refreshed our yard!!! I highly recommend The Backyard Auburn!!

name: Ken Tidwell
text: Bryan Waits of The Backyard has done 2 projects for us in the last year. They installed a short height but long rock wall and several rock planters along with a flagstone walkway on the first project. It was done on time and budget. The work was quality and looked wonderful. The second project that they just finished was another walkway from our deck to the fire pit. It turned out wonderfully just like the other one did. His guys are very professional and nice to work with. I would recommend them highly.

name: jen jones
text: I highly recommend Brian and Backyard Auburn. He listed to what our vision was and the finished patio is exactly what we wanted.

name: Hope Henderson
text: We had a patio and a wall built at our house.  Bryan and the crew did exactly as promised.  They came here and worked hard for three days and finished.  We love the new patio and wall!  It transformed the front of our house into something beautiful!  Thank you so much!  Hope and Mark

name: Chuck Isbell, M.D.
text: Bryan and his crew recently installed  this quarry stone wall for a raised flower bed in my sloped front yard. They got on the project quickly, completed it in a couple of hours, and the cost was very reasonable. The quality of workmanship is excellent and I am thrilled with the results. If I have any future work like this I know exactly who to call! I would recommend Bryan and his staff at The Backyard to anyone needing the services they provide.

name: latricia weatherford
text: Extremely amazing place. The owner actually took my call and came in on a Sunday to help us. Thanks so much Backyard!

name: David Shropshire
text: The Backyard in Auburn did a beautiful job laying stone over our existing concrete sidewalk, and extending our back patio. They are experts in working with natural stone, but I was equally impressed with the owner's (Bryan) commitment to customer service and follow-up to insure we were satisfied when the job was finished.

name: joe best
text: This company is top notch!  They did a superb job and cleaned up afterwards after putting in a Flagstone patio for us. They exceeded all of my expectations I closing being responsibly priced. Will use them again for any other projects!

name: Laura Kincaid
text: Bryan and his skilled team of professionals just completed a project for us that has exceeded our expectations in every way possible. The customer service and attention to detail are unmatched. The Backyard can completely transform your outdoor space. HIGHLY recommend!!

name: Bill Baas
text:
Bryan and his team are awesome.  It's incredible to watch them work, they are well oiled machine and produce awesome looking brick and stone work.

This is my third experience with Bryan and The Backyard Team.  Excellent communication, quality work and clean up after the job was complete.

name: Foster White Jr
text: Great place with great service.

name: Vicki Cross
text: Mr. Bryan, Thank you so much for the outstanding job you and your wonderful staff have provided to us! Everything is so beautiful!  I love it!  From the moment you and your staff arrived, we have received the most outstanding services anyone could have ever wanted!  Everyone was so courteous, kind and the most professionally organized organization I have ever experienced!  You were always on time and each individual worked hard to achieve the highest level of quality in service and production of product satisfaction!  I could infinitely go on about you, your staff and the BEAUTIFUL FIREPLACE AND PATIO you designed and built in my backyard!  You are the Chick Fil-A in masonry construction!!!   Chick-Fil-A is known for their quality in service and delicious food.  You, Sir, are second to none with your quality of service and product satisfaction!  Each of you are artist when it comes to your work product.  Your signature has been permanently engraved in the beautiful fireplace in my yard!!! Thank you so much for allowing me the honor to receive one of your beautiful fireplace/patio signatures pieces !  Again, thank you for everything!   May GOD BLESS each of you in every way!  Y’all are the greatest!

name: Debbie Smith
text: The Backyard crew installed a flagstone patio, walkway, and flowerbed surround for us and we couldn’t be happier!  The crew was very skilled, hard-working, careful and courteous and did a beautiful job. I highly recommend them for any such project!

name: Randel Whitehead
text: Brian and his team were so great to work with and the product they provide is wonderful! We told Brian our budget for the project and he worked with us to design our patio and fire pit. His team was on time each morning and worked hard throughout the project to finish on time as promised. He is great to work with and I could not recommend him more!

name: Maria Gilleland
text:
Brian and his crew are fabulous! Prompt, professional, reasonably priced and a pleasure to work with! Had a stone walkway put in; looks great! I will be calling in Brian and his team again for the next project!
Maria G.
Auburn

name: Laurie Pearce
text: About a year or so ago Bryan made us a flagstoned patio , so the other day I called him to help us again with a patio once again you could not have asked for anyone better. Always professional and his help is always nice and Courteous and the workmanship is the best around. Highly recommend. Will do business with him again.

name: Tamara Byal
text: We had an amazing experience with The Backyard.  Brian and his team were exceptional. They showed up when they said they would and we’re very efficient. They arrived at 7:30am and completed the job by 2:30pm turning a worthless portion of our yard into a beautiful flag stone patio with a fire pit.  Brian had contacts to connect our gas line to the fire pit and was very knowledgeable about how to drain water away from the area.   Very reasonably priced. A seamless, wonderful experience and we wholeheartedly recommend this company!

name: Ben Pugh
text: Great work and great communication! The Backyard is who you want to use for your all stonework or other hardscape needs.

name: Will Tampling
text: What a professional job! We couldn’t be more pleased with the job Brian Waites and his crew did on our flower bed borders. They were prompt, worked a solid day, cleaned up after themselves and very reasonably priced. I would highly recommend, and will!! Thank you to “The Backyard”.

name: Helene Fincke
text: Bryan and his team are very professional and talented at what they do. The team who installed my patio were very focused on their task which was completed in a timely manner and looks beautiful.They take great pride in their work. Everyone was very easy to work with. Their work is first class. I would highly recommend them.

name: Sherri Rainer
text: Bryan and his team do beautiful stone work!  I can not say enough about how easy Bryan made our project come together.  His years of experience, professionalism, and consideration of our needs made all the difference!  I look forward to future projects with The Backyard!

name: Jay Fain
text: I couldn’t think of a better place to buy my Big Green Egg. The staff was very accommodating and made my decision very easy. They have every accessory for a Bug Green Egg you could ever ask for. Plus, they have a beautiful selection of planters and natural stone to choose from.

name: Paul Olsen
text: We hired The Backyard to renovate an existing patio and install a new walkway and stone fire pit.  We found their work to be extremely high quality and performed on the schedule they committed to, and they demonstrated in a number of ways that they were clearly committed to making sure we were satisfied.  I'd absolutely, highly recommend them.

name: Stephanie Simmons
text: These guys were very easy to work with, and I was very happy with the end result. I would definitely work with them again!

name: LaDonna Thornton
text: Backyard Auburn did a great job on my patio and walkway.  I love it!  They were extremely easy to work with and very accommodating.  I would definitely use them again.

name: david giegel
text: Brian was very responsive and made sure every detail of our project was perfect.  I would highly recommend  them!

name: leigh nicks
text: Brian and his team are nothing short of amazing. Their professionalism, efficiency, craftsmanship, and respect are top notch. They have constructed two slate patios and a rock garden drainage system for us, and we will continue to ask for their services for all future projects.

name: Blake Hobbs
text: The Backyard Auburn does beautiful top quality work! They are always timely on projects and always produce exceptional work. We highly recommend using them for any projects you have in mind.

name: Taylor Rogers
text:
We highly recommend The Backyard Auburn.  Our job was done on time and on budget.  The work looks great and is done to very high standards.

Looking forward to getting more work done!

name: T.C. Fincher
text: We just had a small project completed by The Backyard and are pleased to say they did a beautiful job!  I will not hesitate to have them do other projects for us in the future.  Brian and his team were all very professional, polite, and helpful. If you ride out to their business you can see several examples of their workmanship and get ideas as well.   I highly recommend The Backyard.

name: Schuyler Watrous
text: Look no where else for your patio construction needs.  Brian and his crew have done two jobs for me.  The first he came back to fix a job that was done incorrectly by another builder.  Had to rip it up and start over.  The second job was just completed and we are so happy.  They are in and out in no time.

name: Michael Rabren
text: Brian and his employees have done several jobs for me and have always done a professional job! I would highly recommend The Backyard for any of your masonry needs.

name: Kimberly Munshower
text: Excellent end product! The process was quick and simple. Brian worked with me and adjusted on the fly to accommodate my wishes. The workmanship is incredible and the pride of ones work apparent!!  Also, the clean up was meticulous!! Can't wait for our next project!! Thanks Brian

name: Reynolds Outdoors
text: Bryan's team did a great job with our patio extension. They got the job done quickly and it looks great. I will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Matt Harrison
text: Quality work done on time and at quoted price. Stone columns we had installed had small details that set them apart from others. Jobsite condition was spotless after completion.

name: Richard Himmer
text: They did exactly what they said they would do.  I thought I had a problem with my walkway but it was done correctly.  He was willing to do whatever it took to make me happy.  Wish all contractors were like him

name: Benjamin Fagan
text: We're thrilled with the work of Brian and his team. They installed a patio and front walkway of reclaimed brick pavers, in a herringbone pattern. The work was done on time and at the price quoted, and we will definitely be repeat customers if the need arises.

name: Edward Pearce
text: Bryan and his crew were very professional and easy to work with , he built a 280 sq.foot flagstone patio with a table for a big green egg. Bryan made great recommendations to guide us with the right design. I highly recommend Bryan and his crew. Will do business with him again

name: Jennifer Robinson
text:
Brian and his crew did a fabulous job on a beautiful patio at my new house. I had been trying to figure out on my own exactly what I wanted and all my ideas just didn’t feel right. Brian came out and with his years of expertise was able to quickly come up with a plan that I immediately knew was just what I had been trying to come up with and failing miserable at. I get so many compliments on this patio and seating wall from all my neighbors.

Would highly recommend!! Top quality work!!

name: Greg Carlson
text: Fire pit patio constructed in 5 hours and is beautiful!  These guys were a well oiled machine.

name: Jacqueline Vaughan
text: I'm so delighted with the quality of work Bryan and his crew performed on the flagstone patio & walkway. He was able to schedule project sooner and job completed in a timely matter. Additionally, I very much appreciated Bryan's professional demeanor as we worked a through a  minor design change.  Would highly recommend his services to others.

name: teresa page
text:
“The Backyard” out of Auburn, Alabama..
I watched the ugly transform into the beautiful.
Brian Wait’s team did a wonderful job!
Way above my expectations,  Happy customer in Salem, Alabama.
Thank you!!☀️☀️

name: Theresa O'Steen
text: Over the years we have had Brian and his crew work for us on several backyard projects at our properties.  These have included a fire pit flagstone patio and a walkway.  He has always been professional and easy to discuss what we wanted and his follow through has been excellent.  I highly recommend them.  I tried to do a patio once DIY style, big mistake.  Call Brian he's an artist with stone.

name: Chris Rehm, Sr.
text: I had Backyard Of Auburn do a project in my backyard in Auburn.. They did a fantastic job. We had kudzu and bamboo and erosion with a drainage ditch through the yard.  Brian and his crew cleared the yard tiered the yard and put down a tarp and rocks and in the drainage ditch large rock and it looks wonderful. I could not be more pleased. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Michael Scifres
text: Bryan and his guys did an astounding job at re-doing our covered patio. The old concrete was torn out and replaced with flagstone that looks amazing. All done in one day. Will definitely be using again in the future!

name: Philippe Scheys
text: Bryan and his crew are great to work with on projects to enhance your outdoor space. The end product is beautiful and professionally built, and in a very short time-frame!

name: Dane Griffith
text: I've worked with Bryan and The Backyard on three different projects.  They are always professional and the quality of their work is of the highest quality.  You can't go wrong with The Backyard!!

name: David Thomason
text: Brian was friendly and proactive. He called several days ahead of the appointed installation date to confirm and was onsite exactly on time. As a retired construction manager I appreciated the high quality of the workmanship. Brian also called to follow up after the work was done. I highly recommend The Backyard to anyone wanting stone work done.

name: James Long
text: Bryan and the folks at The Backyard were awesome! The prices were competitive and the quality was outstanding. I had them do a 290 square foot rock patio and I couldn't be happier. I would definitely use them again. Highly recommended!

name: Chris Kearns
text: Bryan and his crew haven't done a project for me lately, but at one time they rebuilt some entrance columns and a commercial sign for me a few years.  They looked good at the time, and they still look great years later.  Now they are doing outdoor kitchens too?  Maybe it's time for another project - a fun one.

name: Shannon Belletti
text: Drove 40 minutes to their store. Arrived over an hour before closing time and no one here. (Wednesday afternoon in June) Sign on door said to call for assistance. Tried calling twice but no answer and no way to leave a message.

name: Larry Wilson
text: Was in need of fireplace work and Backyard did a great job .

name: Jr Feild
text:
Brian Waits and the Backyard crew came to my house and completed a large flagstone patio for me.  His price was fair; their work was unbelievably quick and excellent!  The work was done on time and at the price Brian quoted.  I rate their work as 5 stars and we are very happy with our completed patio.

Junior Feild

name: D
text: Outstanding workmanship and looks great! I highly recommend The Backyard to anyone who wants it done right.

name: Cindy Fischer
text: Web site says Sat 8am till 2pm drove from Evergreen Al to a closed store!! 😠. You lost a sale I wont come back!

resp.text: We are very sorry for the miscommunication about our Saturday hours. We are not open on Saturdays in the winter, but the Google hours were not updated. If you'd be willing to try us again we would love to help in the future!

name: Jackie Hayes
text: Today I completed another transaction to purchase a sewing machine from Ken's with the help of Amanda. She was extremely helpful, knowledgeable and patient as I had a couple delays. I've purchased other machines, accessories and notions from Ken's and had technical assistance as well. Every contact with them has been 'over top the top'. The prices are always the best, service and communication always very helpful. They are my go-to business for all things sewing.

name: M P
text: I had placed an online order about a week or so ago (customer service when calling with inquires was excellent), something came up and I needed to cancel. No questions asked, and they already issued a refund. What great service.

name: Kevin A.
text:
I have had only great service and help with Ken's

During the Covid-19 lock down in both AL & NC I was sure I couldn't get anything done. I was wrong, I sent emails to several places and only Ken's responded. I was able to talk to Jeremy about that I needed to fill in for what I already have.

Jeremy listened to the fact that I have a heavy duty machine that I can sew from 7/8" thick of 6oz stacked leather to heavy upholstery. I needed to fill in the gap to do smaller. I wanted a machine that would hold up and I had support for. I bought a Janome 6600 PRO that I love. I ordered it on Friday and received it on Monday to Western NC.

I can now sew from silk to saddles

I called in after the machine arrived with a couple of questions about the machine and its options. Every time I called Jeremy took my call and answered them with the best intentions. I never felt that I was up sold or under appreciated.

Good Job (Jeremy) and Ken's sewing

name: Julia Bowden
text: I have ordered a Brother Embroidery machine online and have been dealing with Amanda Allen. She has gone above and beyond to make sure I have been happy. And while I have never met Amanda I feel that I’ve known her forever! Now just waiting for my machine! Thanks for your patience Amanda!!!

name: Cathyanne Raper
text: Great Place to get all sewing  Notions. And sewing machines.

name: Tere
text: I've ordered embroidery/quilting machines from them by phone a few times and I've always received great customer service. Kevin is very helpful and great to work with. Shipping to AZ went great with no problems. Highly recommend.

name: Ann Chastain
text:
I used to like Ken's.  My current experience with service is absolutely terrible.  5 months, no repair, no phone calls, none of my calls returned.  And I was lied to when I picked up a still unrepaired machine.  Totally unforgivable.  I have recommended Ken's in the past,  never again.
Edited to add that I confirmed that the machine they said was mine is most definitely not.   The power cord/foot control I have will not fit .  I took in a machine for a small repair and now have a $500 doorstop.

name: Addison Carter
text: Ordered a new Brother SE1900 embroidery machine (with free shipping) and received it in two days. I was skeptical of ordering from here at first, but let me tell you, I will be ordering from them exclusively for my sewing / embroidery needs in the future. I got a call an hour after placing my order to confirm my shipping address. I received in my order TWO DAYS - incredible service!!

name: INFP McGee
text:
I have not been to your store, but i had to tell you how much I appreciate how clear your website is on what products you carry and how much each item cost. I live outside of Augusta, GA and the shops around here like to use car sales tactics to get people in the door. It really upsets me.
I will be favoring your website and will be back.
Thank you for being a source of actual information and honesty.

name: Carolyn Dehner
text: Amazing customer service. Bought a sewing machine from them via Amazon, but had to suddenly leave town and wasn't home for delivery (requiring signature). They were very responsive whenever I sent a message, and when the machine was mistakenly returned to them, they sent another one asap. Very competent and cooperative. Thank you!

name: Regenia Greenhill
text: I love this store - it’s my go to place😇

name: Debra Bisacchi
text: WOW!  Buying a sewing machine online can be risky, but their customer service was better than any I have received from local sewing shops, and when I had problems with my new machine they asked if I want to swap it for a new one.   I did.  No problem. I will do more business with Ken’s Sewing Center.

name: Ashlee J. Pryor-Pitluk
text:
Ken's is INCREDIBLE! I placed an online order with them late Tuesday night, received a call to verify my shipping address (in Texas) early Wednesday morning, received my shipping information 15 minutes later and had my order delivered early Friday afternoon. Free shipping with processing & delivery in less than one week! Unreal!!!

Not only did I get my coverstitch machine for significantly less than I would have if I purchased from Amazon BUT the customer service and shipping exceeded my expectations AND I was able to support a small business. I can't recommend Ken's enough for all your sewing needs!

name: Nikki Arko
text: From start to finish the customer service was amazing. The staff took time to answer all my questions. The layaway plan was so convenient. I live several states away but received my machine in a few days. I will definitely order from them again.

name: Cheryl Holloway
text: The customer service is outstanding! I had an issue with a certain machine I had ordered and Kevin and Amanda took care of what needed. I would recommend this company over and over and if I could give more than 5 stars I would!!!

name: Neal Martin
text: Very friendly and helpful staff. Good location. Wide range of equipment and supplies.

name: mitzi fitz
text: Their customer service is above and beyond. I can't believe how helpful and nice they were even when things with my order got complicated. Great products and selection too. But buy from them because they are great people who will help make everything right.

name: Dennis Cunningham
text: My family and I have had a great experience with Ken's Sewing Center. Questions and concerns were addressed promptly and professionally.  We highly recommend the company!

name: Connie Owensby
text: Their customer service absolutely cannot be beat. They are all very helpful from the lady who answers the telephone to all the other employees. Kevin has always helped me with a question or an issue immediately. I'm a customer forever. I've been using them for over 14 years and purchased several things from them. I couldn't be more pleased. Even though I live several states away, they are eager to satisfy my sewing needs and expedite my orders. I appreciate good service.

name: Les Haffner
text: If you need service or advice Jeremy is the man. Been working with him for years now.

name: Margaret Woody
text: I ordered the Janome BE1000, I had problems with the bobbin getting jammed right away, I returned It within the thirty day, however I had a pay then back the shipping cost they paid to ship it to me, I was going to buy the janome 3000 or 5000 and pay the difference, I quickly changed my mind because of having to pay them back the shipping cost they paid to ship my janome BE 1000. It was not my fault the bobbin was jamming, I followed all the instructions on threading the machine and threading the bobbin. It was a bad machine.

name: Rick B
text: Great place! The machine I ordered was not in stock, but they sent me an even better model at no extra cost. Great communication. Highly recommended!

name: Steve Flesher
text: Excellent customer service and huge selection. My wife and I own a small handmade apparel company  and were able to purchase equipment and supplies  from Ken's very quickly and easily, even during the quarantine. We then purchased an embroidery machine by Janome and have had a blast experimenting and playing around with a new part of our business. Ken's was able to set us up with a huge assortment of thread as a starter kit for our machine and the colors they selected for us was awesome!

name: Susan Pedersen
text: I sent 3 email inquiries looking for some legitimate advice while researching sewing machines to purchase. I contacted them both through their website and through Amazon. No advice offered, they just said, “yes we have lots of machines”. I could’ve found that out myself. If you aren’t going to help customers via email then you should not advertise the feature on your website and invite people to email you. I guess they don’t need the business. I understand everyone is looking for sewing supplies right now but if you don’t treat customers right every day you don’t deserve five star reviews. You shouldn’t treat people poorly just because you’re busy during a pandemic.

name: Jaki M.
text: i have called 5 times , left 4 voicemails in 1 day and no one is calling me back. I simply want to buy an item and have a question.

name: Sharon Willmering
text: Great people. They processed an upgrade to a sewing machine. Really helped me get the choice right.  Thank you.

name: Erik Harris
text: My wife states that this is an honest, ethical business with great customer service, and great servicing and repairs.

name: Lori Witham
text: I purchased a sewing machine online last weekend.  On Monday I received an email from Fed Ex saying that the shipping label had been created.  I said to myself, "Wow, what a great company they're right on top of shipping purchases!"  Two days later my sewing machine is still sitting in Alabama and has not moved an inch.  So on Thursday I call & speak with Brad who says he'll find out what's going on & to call him back in a half an hour.  I do & it takes over an hour before somebody answers the phone, that person says Brad will call me back...which never happens. Late in the day (after repeated no answers) I get Brad on the phone & he says he can't find where my sewing is but in the morning he'll try to find out & if he's unable he'll print a new label and ship another machine to me but call him back at 11 a.m.  I've now been calling every few minutes for the past half hour and nobody is answering the phone.  It's remarkable how they are right on top of taking the money from your bank account, but shipping your purchase, finding an answer, or even answering the phone falls low on the priority list. I feel like I'm being conned by this place.

name: Heather Helton
text: I've bought my first embroidery machine here and I couldn't get any better service anywhere nice friendly people and great service for purchasing a sewing, embroidery or quilting machine they fixed my sewing machine I had gotten from my mother-in-law when she passed away and loved this place ever since..Keep up the great service thanks!!!

name: Jean Richmond
text: The greatest service I've received in customer service in a long time. Found they had a return of a Janome 6650, which I decided I wanted, but before I made my final decision, it was sold. Tina worked her magic and got me a new one at a great price and the rest is history. It's on it's way. Merry Christmas to me! Thanks, Tina!

name: Kiara Colon
text:
I placed an order on 7/7/20 for a Brother 1034D Serger. I specifically called my order in due to website saying “Advance Order” in other terminology a “pre order”. I was completely fine ordering the machine on a pre-order basis since everywhere else is completely sold out.

When placing my phone order, a women named Pam took my order. Pam reassured me the sergers would go out for shipping on 7/27/2020. That’s why I felt so confident in making the purchase.

Today, 08/01/2020 I called to check the status of my order as I haven’t received any updating emails of phone calls. The person who answered my phone call took my order number and proceeded to tell me, “ma’am I cannot give you a date on that. You’ll need to call back on Monday and speak to Pam” ...

Why do I need to call back on Monday and speak to Pam? It should all be centralized system! The same information Pam types into a computer should be the same effort another employee puts into finding the details of my order. I ended up complying with calling back on Monday which is 2 days from now but I am livid.

I have a business to run, customers needs that need to be fulfilled and crafted and I’m yet again being pushed back on development dates of my apparel collection because now I have no idea when my machine is going to arrive AFTER being told they were to go out for delivery on 7/27/2020.

If I do not have further information on Monday I will be forced to ask for a refund because this is not the customer service any customer deserves.

name: Anonymous Anonymous
text:
I ordered Back in March a  Juki mo 1000 from this people Through Amazon after a month of using the knife broke and the wasn’t shutting off anymore so I told Kevin the issue with the machine he told will take like 3 days and I shipped it back to them after two weeks I called to follow up and they were still working on it I reminded him about the door a week passed by then I got a call from Kevin to collect the money for the shipping so when I got the machine I noticed right away that the door was still misaligned I sent an email and he responded back 3
Days later he responded by the time I called the warranty company with amazon and I placed a claim with them so now I’m still waiting for the door to be fix because the warranty has to send it back to the factory, this is very bad business and wasted time. I will never order anything again from this people.

name: Corrie Leber
text: Absolutely fantastic customer service!  Thank you so much for your help.  I would recommend Ken's Sewing Center to anyone.

name: Glenda n Ron Monterusso
text: They had my embroidery machine  since  September 2019 never got a call from them  I have had to call every time .  Was told over and over they will be calling me.  Today Feb 3 2020 I call once again to be told they cant fix it and I should have been told  Really the people there are the worst.  Don't recommend them  very sorry place.   But did find better deals online, so look else where before wasting your time at Kens sewing

name: les haffner
text: I would like to take a second to say what awesome customer service Ken's has. I'm talking 3 years after the sale Brad with the service dept. is helping me as if I purchased today. We have purchased 2 multi-needle machines from Ken's and will continue as long as they are around. If you want top notch service and support and a friendly staff with great prices look no further. AAA++++

name: Rachael Erfurdt
text: I live in Missouri and had an issue with one order I had placed. I called, the lady on the phone was super helpful and she immediately got it taken care of!! I will be ordering from them again in the future!

name: Alvin Vega
text: I ordered a Bernette Sew & Go 1 for the first time from here and the communication and service was too notch. I received the sewing machine in only 3 days and was exactly as described. I give Ken's Sewing Center an A+++++. I highly recommend to all and I will definitely do business with them in the future.

name: Amy
text: Wonderful service. Agent Tina was very kind and helpful. Thank you!

name: The masters of everything
text: About 3 weeks ago I researched which machine I wanted to buy my wife, we found the exact machine we wanted and the Jenome 3000 was out of stock, everywhere, including Ken's Sewing center website, it clearly read OUT OF STOCK.  I continued to check on it day after day and about a week later when I googled the Jenome 3000 Ken's Sewing center changed it from "out of stock" to "IN STOCK" I immediately added it to my cart and checked out. 2 weeks pass and I called to check my order status and the lady in the phone says "sir, this was a pre-order" I argued and told her I would never have bought it if it was a pre-order. She says yes sir it clearly says pre-order. I checked my receipt, and no where did it specify that this was a pre-order. I googled Jenome 3000 and again it clearly says "IN STOCK". So I called again to speak with a manager and the secretary tells me he's busy and she could help me, I explained the story and she tells me, "yes sir, it does say IN STOCK, but if you scroll down to the details it does say it's a pre-order, and she was right. BUT THIS IS CLEARLY A BAIT AND SWITCH CON. I didn't scroll down because I already researched the machine and the website allowed me to purchase the machine from start to finish, including my receipt, without EVER clearly stating it was a pre-order. The status said "processing" not "pre-order. No where other than the details did it specify that the machine was on back order and now they tell me it will ship JULY 27. Thats a 2 month processing time and they're trying to trick people by changing the status to "IN STOCK". That's false advertising and now they put me 2 weeks behind getting another machine for my wife's business. Completely unprofessional and tricky. I don't care if your website doesn't allow for the status to only read "in stock" or "out of stock" They should leave it "OUT OF STOCK" and put in the details that customers can call for a PRE-ORDER.

name: Barry King
text:
They are  a big green egg dealer and they are very nice will help you
Out with any of your needs , questions.   prices are good  I would recommend
Anyone that wants to get a green egg  go see them  friendly service

name: Vee Honea
text: Absolutely the best customer service! They go above and beyond.  Great prices on the brands I love.

name: Herbert Bloomer Jr.
text: Bought a new Brother Pacesetter Inno-ís PS500 sewing machine a couple weeks ago and could not get it to sew as it was knotting up the thread near the bobbin. We went in, asked Brad if he could figure out what the machine or user was doing wrong. He set it up and right away noticed one area that was threaded wrong. Brad had it purring like a kitten in 5 minutes! (It was the user, not the brand new Brother Pacesetter Inno-ís PS500!). We will definitely be using Ken's Sewing exclusively for our sewing needs! And one day, The Big Green Egg BBQ too!

name: Amanda Mcdaniel
text: Ordered a machine online.  The customer service that I received was amazing and I love the machine.   Couldn't recommend Ken's enough.

name: monika
text: I LOVE Ken Sewing center, it is my to go place online. They ship promptly, they take orders over the phone...very helpful, and their customer service is outstanding. Highly recommend

name: linda williams
text: Always helpful I just love this place I’ve only ordered online but plan on making a trip there. Their staff is always willing to answer any and all questions.  No other place to shop ladies

name: Steven Grabosky
text: Amazing customer service, processing, stock, availability, and shipping. Couldn't be happier. Fantastic!

name: Rebecca Elliott
text: Wow!   Fast service.  Ordered a sewing machine and it was on my doorstep in a few days.  :)

name: Jeanette Nichols
text:
So happy with the customer service I received buying a used serger over the phone.
Top-notch expertise and warm, friendly, knowledgeable service!!!

name: Eric Helal
text: After an initially poor experience, Kevin resolved all of my issues and made my experience positive.

name: Joe Rivera
text: Tues morning price for machine was $399. Tues afternoon price for same machine was $479 when they were down to only two machines left in stock. Can’t help but feeling they are taking advantage of customers when stock is low.

name: Lynne Brown
text: Ordered the wrong size sewing machine cover. Have to pay return shipping,which is fine, BUT, I also get to pay a restocking fee, AND their shipping to me, which was supposed to be free when I ordered the cover. Not worth it! Stay away from these scammers.

name: Carol Rode
text: Super happy with my Janome Cover Pro 1000 CPX that I ordered from Ken's Sewing Center. Shipment came super fast, machine worked great right out of the box. Only glitch was they forgot to ship my bonus kit, but I called right away and they shipped it to me the next day. It wasn't supposed to arrive until Monday next week, but it was delivered today on Saturday.  Thanks everyone at Ken's.

name: Therese Connell
text: I ordered a refurbished Bernette b37 from Ken’s.  When the machine came, I couldn’t believe that I had been upgraded to a Bernette 38.  Perhaps they were short on my requested machine, but I know I will be purchasing any needed products from Ken’s from now on.

name: Ju H
text:
So far so good., I do not have any Dealers near me , I am disabled and can not get to one.  I tried the dealers within 100 miles of me.  Both were a tad shady.  One wanted to charge me extra to use my CC.  They said it was same as financing and Only could get the lower amount I I paid Cash.  The other in Duluth Ga.  really didn't want to talk to me since I told him I would not be the one to pick it up.  So I was recommended Kens from a Facebook Group .  I talked to Jeremy that first day.  He didn't try to over sell me anything.  He listened to what I wanted.   I ended up getting just what I needed and nothing more.  He didn't over sell anything. I bought a re-manufactured machine , that he said came with full warranty as a new one  which gave me the extra to purchase the upgrade kit to expand.   Maybe I can get basic software at later date.

Since I am out of state ( which makes me a bit nervous about getting service) which after 30 days, I am responsible for all shipping charges.   He had my choice in here in 2 days  and I didn't receive all the goodies some talk about such as starter packs or basic software but I did receive 4 spools of thread which I do like the quality.  Plus he added the upgrade for me which I paid extra for but was kind enough to do it before he sent it. .  My experience was a pleasant one.  But the first couple I called made me want to forget about sizing up and forget dealing with any dealers.

Hopefully I will get the same service each time I call that I got the first few days that I was purchasing the machine..

name: Matthew Richardson
text: Ken's sewing is awesome!

name: Kaye Wise
text: Wouldn’t even consider buying a machine from anyone else even though it is a 100 mile trip one way. Customer service is excellent and Brad and Will are the best!

name: Pat Hines
text: This place rocks!  Donna has been so very patient with me purchasing and learning my Brother PE-770 over the last 3 years.  They go the 3rd and 4th mile to be helpful.  Their prices are the very best.  Fast shipping, too.  They know that I live in Moore, OK in tornado alley and they show genuine concern for me in the spring!  Also, Jeremy in the technical department treats me like he has all the time in the world.  More than fair and helpful.  It seems to me that they believe in "doing unto others as you would have others do unto you"!  I keep threatening them that when I go to see family in Huntsville, Alabama, I am going to come see them and give them a hug for ALL their help.  And I will surprise them with a visit!  I highly, highly recommend Ken's for all your machine embroidery needs!

name: Sue K
text: I purchased my second machine from Ken's Sewing Center two days ago. Once again, it was a wonderful experience. The staff was very friendly, helpful and delightful to work with. They are very fair in their dealings. I have also ordered from Ken's online and every time things went smoothly and they shipped very quickly. I highly recommend purchasing from them.

name: Jane Wong
text: Kevin and his brother are amazingly helpful and knowledgeable. They provided our large group with great service. They don't stock fabric because much of the store is devoted to every kind of machine you could want, but we all went away with scissors, rulers, and a wide range of other items.

name: Mindy Roeske
text: Absolutely THE BEST business...SERVICE, HELPFUL IN EVERY DEPARTMENT, EXCELLENT PRODUCTS... (Love my two Janome's & the accessories and support on care and service).  From Kansas City, I THANK YOU ☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆!

name: James Clark
text:
I am in the process of buying my third embroidery machine from them. The staff is super and so friendly and very helpful. You can't beat their prices and all the help they give you.
Frenchie

name: Gaynor Mueller
text: I had the BEST customer service from Donna at Ken's Sewing Center.  Called me about a product as promised, and no pressure when I said my purchase would have to wait a couple weeks.  Called back to place the order and still received super friendly and fast service.

name: Dell Richards
text:
My Janome 14000 was delivered yesterday exactly as Kevin said it would be!  I am thrilled with the customer service I received from Kevin and his team at Ken's Sewing!  I deliberated for several months before deciding on this machine.  I am positive I made the right decision!

Thank you!!

name: Elisabeth Zillinger
text: I found Ken’s Sewing Center through a google search and I’m so happy I found them. Keith gave great advice and I’m very happy with the serger I ordered from them. I also got my coverstitch machine fixed and it works great again and it was for a great price.

name: Haley Knight
text: They are all great great guys! Friendly helpful service. And great prices for all your sewing needs!

name: Ashley Portwood
text: I just purchased a Pr-655 here. Ken's saved me $1,000.00's. The retailer here in my local area gave me a price on the same machine that was about $5,000.00 more. Brad was great to work with! I am a forever customer!!

name: S Smith
text: Wouldn’t buy from here if it was the last sewing place on earth. They’ve say “we will call ya back”  each time I’ve called (which has been a few times) in which they never call me back. They sent me an incorrect item that does me no good. I would steer clear.

name: Charlie C
text: Great place, good ppl. Plenty of equipment to choose from and a great staff that will let you know what you're looking at buying. They will explain the differences between the machines and help you make a good selection.

name: Sherry Hill
text: I am a new quilter,  so I had to order a machine foot in order to begin.   They had exactly what I needed.  Plus I ordered gold plated seamstresses scissors that were darling!  The part to brag about?  It came in two days!  Thank you Ken's!

name: Bonita Moore
text: Very nice and attentive folks to do business with ! Look forward for years to come in dealing with them all !

name: Cathy H
text: THEFT-So frustrating!  I ordered two feet for my Janome MC9900 and after waiting for several weeks, I phoned the company to find out the status of my order. I was told that one of the feet wasn't in stock and they were waiting for the second one to come in so they could ship together.  They assured me that they would send it right out and the second one when it arrived at their business.  I didn't receive the shipment, so out of desperation I drove to the local shop and purchased the one foot they had in stock and ordered the other foot and purchased it a week later.   They finally sent the first foot- after I purchased and used the one I bought locally.  I didn't think much about it and over a YEAR LATER, I still hadn't received the second foot that I had paid for.  I called them, AGAIN, and she  located my order and saw that the second foot had NEVER BEEN SENT. She said the 'Billing' person wasn't in, but she assured me that she would have them issue me a refund, in the form of a check.  It's now been another 5 MONTHS and I still have NOT RECEIVED the foot or the refund check!   This is FRAUD and BAD BUSINESS practice.

name: Margie Tumlin
text: My experience with Ken's has been stellar. In the past few years have purchased 4 machines and other accessories from them.  Purchased a Janome  9400,what a sweet machine and three other Janomes, two as gifts for my neices. They are as pleased as I am. Am partial to Janomes always reliable and easy to use. At the ripe old age of 78,decided to learn to quilt. Fortunately I am about 70 mi. From Ken's. Needed some assistance with setting up and learning about free motion quilting on my 9400.. Jeremy patiently assisted me and I am having a grand time learning now. Highly recommend Ken's .

name: Rhonda Baldwin
text: Great place to do business. Very friendly.  Well worth the drive.

name: Al Dockery
text: Ordered an OTT light late Friday afternoon. arrived in Little Rock Tuesday morning in great shape. Very efficient.

name: cheryl Simmons
text:
I love this place!  Kevin is the best!!! I ordered my Janome 15000 from them and I love it.  Since then I've started ordering ALL of my embroidery supplies.
Thanks so much for helping this beginner!!!

name: Dora Alicia Rivera
text: They sold me a very expensive machine to not only be told that I need a "straight" stitch plate in order for it to stop messing up. I said okay then it gets delayed and several days out I still can not use my machine. Buyer be ware.

name: Samantha Smith
text: I love Ken's! ALWAYS helpful. As soon as I open the door someone is asking me if I need help which helps when I'm in a hurry.

name: Rebecca Taus
text: They've been very helpful each time I've called. And, I'll be calling again I'm sure.

name: Christine McClantoc
text: They do good work

name: Laura Neal
text: Bought Juki 2200qvp long arm and it is fantastic! Brad is wonderful in service and advice!  Thank you!

name: Ed Martin
text:
We recently ordered a new Janome sewing machine through Ken's via their Amazon Marketplace store (we felt like we needed the Amazon security blanket since we'd never dealt with Ken's before). What I didn't notice is that the listing on Ken's website included some extra feet that were not in the Amazon listing - this was MY mistake. Kind of makes sense, since Ken's needs to pay Amazon a commission.

My wife called to inquire, and the woman at Ken's who answered the phone (no phone menu, no transfer, no "I need to ask my manager") quickly said that she understood how we could have misunderstood the listing difference, and that she would send the extra feet free of charge. They just arrived today, 3 business days later.

I'm kind of impressed that Ken's made us whole on something that after all, was our mistake. Next time, I will definitely deal directly with Ken's and cut out the (Amazon) middleman. I'm really impressed and would recommend Ken's to anyone out there.

Ed

name: Jessica Skibicki
text:
WONDERFUL!!!

I have bought over 7 machines from this store and they are amazing! Donna is the SWEETEST person you could ever imagine working with! I would recommend them to everyone! You can't beat Kens!

name: Carol Williams
text: I sent my Janome 12000 to Ken's last year around November. Something happened to the pressure foot.  They tried and tried and tried to fix it always promising it wouldn't be long and would be  returned to me good as new.   5 months went by and finally they gave up and sent it to the manufacturer.  Even when they received my machine, I still had to call them to find out where was my machine and what was happening with it. After 6 months I finally received my machine back with broken  pieces and missing parts.  I called numerous times to get them to send my missing parts and broken pieces and to this day no one has returned my call, or email. Where is the customer service. If this is how they treat their customers then shame on them. There service dept suck big time. This is the short version because there's not enough space to tell  everything that happened.  i am thoroughly disgusted with them. So I'm stuck with a machine that I can't even use.  Buyers beware!!

resp.text: I am sorry you have had a problem.  We will be happy to assist you.  Please do call our toll free number from the website and ask for our service department.  We will be happy to correct this for you immediately.

name: maryann thomas
text: They are always so helpful and their service department is first rate!!

name: Yumi Cos
text:
I wish I could give them negative stars. Stay away from this store. The website says it has excellent service, but Donna and Kevin (owner?) are really unprofessional. Long story short, I received two defective machines and now they have everything back and don't want to give me my money back. The way Donna handles "customer service" is to hang up the phone on you and tell everyone to not answer your calls and not respond to emails. When she does decide to respond via email after writing many times, she doesn't solve the problem, she just causes more and doesn't sign off. The way Kevin "solves problems" is to lie and make up whatever is convenient for him. Have him email you so he cannot go back on his words.

update: RELUCTANTLY, they sent me a third machine that I did NOT want. YES, I had to pay for shipping. The second one was broken within a month and I have email proof that I informed them at that time. I tried to save them money and have them send me a piece and change that to see it that is what was broken. Of course it was over a month by then and hard to contact them so they wanted me to pay for shipping. I had no choice b/c they wouldn't give me a refund for the broken machines they sent me. This was after months of them not refunding me my money & having possession of their machine. Donna was extremely unprofessional and childish. To expand on what I wrote above, she would hang up the phone on you and then when I try to call numerous times, she wouldn't pick up. I would then call with a different phone and then, wah-lah, she is magically answering the phone again. Who does that? Then Kevin gets the phone and has the nerve to tell me I hung up the phone. If I hung up, why would I have tried calling back several times to no avail? Kevin kept giving me the run around and wouldn't let me talk to the owner. I asked him NUMEROUS times to give me the same order when he shipped it, yet when I received it, the threads I had chosen were not included. The ugliest colors they could find were thrown into the package they sent me. I am so tired of dealing with them, I didn't even bother to contact them.

Buyer beware! Do not shop here!

name: Robin Lazenby
text: Only place in the Shoals to get your sewing machine repaired. They have a good selection of pre-owned machines also.

name: Diana Kosty
text:
I FIRST CALLED 1 YEAR AND 6 MONTHS AGO. I NEEDED NEED A SEWING TABLE. A Horn of America 5280 Super Quilter's Dream Sewing Cabinet. I CALLED 5 OTHER PLACES AND COMPARED PRICES AND THEY HAD THE BEST OVER ALL PRICES THAN ANYONE. NOW FOR THE TIME SHE(DONNA) PUT INTO THE SETTING UP AND DELIVERY OF THIS VERY LARGE PURCHASE WAS REALLY EXCELLENT SERVICE AND VERY PATIENCE WITH ME FOR I AM JUST LEARNING. . GOING INTO DETAIL AND GIVING ME HER UNDIVIDED TIME.. LOOK THE PROBLEM IS NO CUSTOMER SERVICE IN TODAY'S WORLD!!!. SHE HAS WONDERFUL KNOWLEDGE AND CUSTOMER SERVICE...
WHAT SOLD ME ON EVEN BUYING IT FROM THEM WAS DONNA. IT WAS MOST EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE EVEN RIGHT DOWN TO DOING WHAT EVER IT TOOK TO GET IT TO ME!!!! AS A CUSTOMER WHO DON'T EVEN LIVE IN ALABAMA. I LIVE IN FLORIDA.I COULD HAVE GONE RIGHT IN THE NEXT CITY OVER AND DID GO THERE, THEY WERE RUDE AND NOT WILLING TO HELP ME. THEY FIGURED  I WOULD NOT GO THRU WITH THE DEAL. THEN ONE WOULD NOT EVEN BRING IT OUT TO MY HOUSE FOR A DELIVERY. IT WAS 800 POUNDS WITH SHIPPING MATERIALS WRAPPED AROUND IT. THEN I NEEDED SOFT WARE FOR ANYONE WHO REALLY WANTS TO READ THE TRUTH ABOUT MY EXPERANCE:FOR MY MACHINE TO DO MANY OTHER DESIGNS TO MAKE WHAT I WANTED ON IT. SHE GUIDED ME TO THE BEST ONE. I CAN NOT DESCRIBE THE SMALL THINGS SHE AND THE OWNER WERE ABLE TO DO SO I CAN HAVE A GREAT DAY ON MY MACHINE.
FIVE STARS JUST DON'T CUT IT I GIVE MANY THANKS AND YES, I BOUGHT STUFF SCENE THAT TIME AND SHE WILL TAKE THE TIME TO GO OVER MY QUESTIONS AND HELP ME GET THE RIGHT PRODUCTS. I HAVE ALWAYS BELIEVED IF YOUR HONEST WITH SOMEONE AND KIND THE SAME WILL COME BACK TO YOU. LIKE NOW I CAN'T BELIEVE SOME OF THE TWO REVIEWS I HAVE READ BECAUSE THEY OR ANYONE THERE HAS NEVER BEEN RUDE OR UGLY TO ME OR MY HUSBAND EVER........  "MANY THANKS TO YOU AND YOUR STAFF KEN AND DONNA"
TO THIS DAY, I HAVE NEVER BEEN IN THEIR STORE, JUST DUE TO THE DISTANCE AND MY DISABILITY TO DRIVE NOW....I WOULD LOVE TO HUG HER AND PERSONALLY SAY THANK YOU.MABY ONE DAY I WILL GET TO GO TO THE STORE.

name: Erica Cummins
text: Do not buy from Ken's!! I ordered a walking foot for my sewing machine a week ago and my order still says 'processing' even though their website claims that all orders ship in 2-3 or 3-4 days. Of course I've already paid $50 for the walking foot and I'm apparently not going to get it...or at least not any time soon.

name: Tim Elam
text: Outstanding service and selection. The staff are wonderful, friendly, and helpful. Highly recommended!

name: DJL
text: I was told by a sewing center in My area that my Janome MC  compulock 888 serger couldn't be repaired because the tension board was out. I almost just left it there for parts! I was so disappointed. He had it for several months and never let me know the situation. I started to shop for a new serger. I didn't find anything I really wanted that was affordable. I called Kens sewing Center after seeing them on Amazon and e-bay in the past and asked to speak with someone who knows serger. I spoke to Jeremy I believe who works on them. He asked what I currently used and explained the situation. He said he had not heard of a tension board on that machine. He said if you are willing to send it to us I will look at your machine and if I can't fix it all you are out is the shipping. I decided to go for it. I shipped it and it was repaired and returned within about 10 days!!! These folks rock!!! I highly recommend them! If you have a Janome Compulock serger Jeremy is the man to work on them! It was almost a year ago it works like a charm to this day!

name: Stephen Bluma
text: Very helpful very knowable up front

name: Barbara Jarchow
text:
Excellent, friendly staff!
Will buy from again.

name: Linda West
text: Great place for sewing and embroidery machines, very helpful and informative

name: Brian Embry
text: Great people and great service

name: Single-Dad Two-Sons
text: I did business with this company for the first time and ordered a brother 1634d serger.

name: Melanie Harrison
text: THEY ARE CROOKS!!!!!! They claim they fix your machine but they don't and if you are "paying for new parts" they never order them! That's coming from a former employee!! I used to use them now I drive 2 hours to have someone fix my stuff because I know it will be quality but NOT KENS! THEY ARE CROOKS!!!!!!!!!!!

name: PJ Dunn
text: Love it! We were driving through on our way to Dothan and stopped here to pick up ferns. Not only did they have a great price but they were huge and certainly were an unexpected delight this time of the year. Everybody was very friendly and we will be stopping by for any of our needs when we're close!

name: Marti Roach
text: Love the people and the Slaw Dogs...throw in some original Boss Man's hot sauce and get a taste of awesomeness...👍

name: John Bridges
text: Shop here all the time have never had a bad experience. You might pay a little more but you dont have to travel in to a big city to get what you want they normally have it here.

name: 5.0hh Stang

text: I love to go here for all my home improvement needs, I would have given 5 stars but for the lack of associates being available for assistance and the extreme price for wood.I had to note that. Covid has made some places lose workers, maybe it will pick back up soon and the price hike on wood is ridiculous but it is everywhere you go. Customers shouldn't have to pay for all the lost business, we suffered too. Lattice $70 Lowes has always been pricier than Home Depot anyway, I guess you pay for that extra service.

name: Brannon Herzing
text: Good job. It's not like these are cheap. Why would you put this box under the other boxes I have?

name: J Martin
text: I'm not exactly sure what the deal is with this place. The lady in hardware is especially nice and knowledgeable. It's just hard to find anyone. No one seems to know where anything is, the lumber saw was broken, and just seems generally under staffed. Once I went in needing help finding a specific fitting for a pipe. There was a group of men standing there talking, and I couldn't really get any of them to help. I went to the customer service desk and waited for a page for about 10 mins. I just left. That was the first time that happened. Usually if you can find someone, they're extremely nice and helpful, but you have to hunt for them. Another time a fellow customer ended up explaining the tools I needed and where to find them because there was no one to be found. I don't really leave bad reviews, but this store needs more employees it seems like. And some serious help.

name: Michael Perry
text:
Like Home Depot - it is very extremely hard to get good assistance from store associates.  They are few and far between.  If or when you do finally get some assistance - they are extremely untrained for an area that they are not assigned to.

All associates should be highly trained in all areas of the store.  And there should be more associates to assist customers.

name: Jimmy Melvin
text: The customer service is usually on point. The only reason for the 3 stars is this location is consistently out of basic materials needed for electrical work. There have been several times I’ve had to actually look on the top shelf at overstock to find what I need if it’s even there. The store however is kept clean and aisles clear.

name: Samantha Wiley
text: Why does your website guarantee satisfaction within thirty days of a paint purchase and claim I can exchange it or get money back? I was just told by the paint desk and customer service your company does not do that. They said people come in showing the website all the time but never do it.

name: jenn0810
text: Nobody cares about customer service any more. Can’t even get someone to check out a 75 year old veteran when there are several people with their aprons on standing around talking to one another. No reason to tell someone to check themselves out and you getting paid to stand there. Absolutely ridiculous.

name: Fitzgerald Hampton
text: Had a bathroom project I was doing I needed a small havksaw and extra blades.  I found everything with no problem made the purchase and left the store. Had no customer associate interaction whatsoever. Which goes back to me saying that Lowe's has very limited amount of associates working throughout the day in each department and they don't have anyone to help customers when needed.

text: Lots of parking easy entry and exit handicapped accessibility clean clean restrooms helpful employees I went to look at plants they had a large variety I was pleased at the prices of what I bought.I went inside and found a plant to put in a seashell I had brought home from the beach that was a surprise.I noticed they had everything to turn your outdoors into your own oasis.Grills canopies plants furniture firepits torches and so much more.Happy hunting always check your local stores website for great deals
